title: I am a freelance musician. How can I get into the jingle industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not know much about the jingle industry. Pick up a few themes like 'car ad'. Chocolate ad. Compose tunes for them and put it up on your website. This will cost you a few thousand rupees. When you send out mails soliciting business make sure you include links. Also get a parallel temp job for few hours a day to cover your daily expenses. Keep trying you never know tomorrow.
